search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.DHCP by DHCP.orig_mac_oui, DHCP.assigned_addr, DHCP.client_fqdn, DHCP.host_name, DHCP.mac | rename DHCP.orig_mac_oui AS orig_mac_oui, DHCP.assigned_addr AS assigned_addr, DHCP.client_fqdn AS client_fqdn, DHCP.host_name AS host_name, DHCP.mac AS mac
```Filter Out Specific Device Types Here``` ```| where !like (orig_mac_oui, "Intel Corporate")```

done.set: | sort -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "orig_mac_oui"="No Instances Found"] | rename orig_mac_oui AS "Device Type", count AS Count, host_name AS Hostname, mac AS MAC, client_fqdn AS FQDN, assigned_addr AS IP
| table orig_mac_oui, assigned_addr, mac | mvcombine delim="," assigned_addr | eval assigned_addr=mvfilter(NOT match(assigned_addr,"-")) | fillnull value="-" assigned_addr
